ygData.subject: Re: Kill the Twink...one curious statement
ygData.msgSnippet: i made the statement and i know it s true. maybe, MAYBE story B played a factor in it, not sure but either way he says he got a 30 day suspension and has never
ygData.messageBody:
i made the statement and i know it's true. maybe, MAYBE story B played a
factor in it, not sure but either way he says he got a 30 day suspension and
has never twinked since
-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 9:54 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Kill the Twink...one curious statement


>From: "Cristie" <cristie@...>
>
>Doesn't this statement make you wonder about the person who was supposedly
>suspended from the game for 30 days or something? If that is Verants
stance
>on the topic then maybe the fellow who was playing EQpoliceman was either
A.
>Fibbing to us to make a point, B. A big annoyance to the GMs so they
>finally told him something happened when it didn't to get him off their
>back, or C. Misinformed or misunderstanding of a statement made to him. I
>really don't give a rip either way, its just a kind of curious thing to
come
>up at this point with all the suspension and banning talk...kinda makes me
>laugh.
>I'm done with the topic as well now, having said this. :)
>Have a darn good day and lets get some fixes put in for wizards now...maybe
>a spell to generate copious amounts of cash and cheeseburgers in
>game.....McWizzy....heh
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 9:50 AM
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Kill the Twinking Subject!!!
>
>
>>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>>
>>
>>
>>CyanLeVey@... wrote:
>>
>>> From: CyanLeVey@...
>>>
>>> I personally have seen GMs come to answer a petition about twinking, and
>say,
>>> and I quote, " Twinking is Pointless, and thus, not illegal. We have no
>way
>>> of verifying or controlling it. Continue enjoying the game, as if the
>person
>>> who YOU have a problem with does not exist. Everyone will be happier
that
>>> way."
>>>
>>> THAT is verants stand, not Suspending people
>>>
>>
>>And I agree with them 100%.
>>
>>Subject pretty much closed, as far as I'm concerned
>>
>>--
>>Qenelin
>>
